## tris2 variable

Applies `p` to `u v`<!-- -->, then `q` to `w x`<!-- -->, and finally `r` to `y z`<!-- -->.

( u v w x y z p q r -- puv qwx ryz )

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
tris2: import("./api").StackFn
```
